metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The HTTP/2 protocol allows a denial of service (server resourceconsumption) because request cancellation can reset many streams quickly,as exploited in the wild in August through October 2023.

criterions.comment: haproxy package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
trafficserver package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
nghttp2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.6 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.10 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.13 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.

nodejs package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
